generated_body: The article titled "Maze of tunnels reveals remains of ancient Jerusalem" is likely to explore the recent discovery of an extensive network of tunnels in Jerusalem, shedding light on the city's historical significance. Readers can expect to learn about the archaeological findings, including artifacts and structures that may provide insights into ancient civilizations that inhabited the area. The article could discuss the implications of these discoveries on our understanding of Jerusalem's history and cultural evolution, as well as the techniques used by archaeologists in this excavation.
